title: Do the gpa in 7th and 8th sem have any relevance wrt the placements?

comments.body:
No, upto 5th and 6th only
You will most likely be placed by the time 7th sem results are out 
Also, 7th and 8th sem have very less credits in total so they don't move your cgpa by huge margins as previous semesters did.

Then which semesters are likely to have more credits?
3rd and 4th?

As per my knowledge, all sems had equal credits till 6th sem
Every sem has equal weightage except 7&8 sems
Cgpa drops quickly but doesn't climb up that easily.
